charges.charge_description: NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE knowingly, intentionally and unlawfully did possess with intent to distribute and did distribute a quantity of cocaine base (commonly known as"crack cocaine"),a Schedule II controlled substance; In violation of Title 21, USC, Sections 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C). (1)

NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE knowingly, intentionally and unlawfully did possess with intent to distribute and did distribute a quantity of heroin, a Schedule I controlled substance; In violation of Title 21, USC, Sections 841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C). (2)
